# simulation data 
```{r sim data}
# simulation data
sim1 <- readr::read_rds(here::here("data/simulation_data", "sim2_trk_10ids_1.rds"))
sim2 <- readr::read_rds(here::here("data/simulation_data", "sim2_trk_10ids_2.rds"))
sim3 <- readr::read_rds(here::here("data/simulation_data", "sim2_trk_10ids_3.rds"))

sim2$id <- sim2$id+10
sim3$id <- sim3$id+20

sim1
sim2
sim3

sim_df <- rbind(sim1, sim2, sim3)
sim_df

# remove the duplicates per id
sim_df <- sim_df %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  distinct(x_, y_, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  ungroup() 


# change the column names 
colnames(sim_df) <- c("ID", "state", "x", "y", "time", "dt")

# data summary
sim_df <- as.data.frame(sim_df)
sim_df

# save the sim_df
saveRDS(sim_df,here::here("data/simulation_data", "sim2_df.rds"))
```
